channel.title: Open Science Group
channel.description: Recent content on Open Science Group

item.description: Open Science Group The Open Science Group is a not-for-profit and open member organisation, with the purpose of exploring ways in which the wider community of scientists can come together to express and make decisions aligned with open science principles. Governance Acting together. Platform Open source tools for attribution, funding, and publishing open science. Law Vertical slide 2
appends to the end of the platform presentation
